channel.title: Updates: Federal Inmate Complaints [Records Request]
channel.description: Updates on the Data Liberation Project's Federal Inmate Complaints request

item.title: Records Published
item.author: The Data Liberation Project
item.description: On July 9, 2024, the Data Liberation Project published the responsive records and documentation describing the data and providing guidance for using it.

item.title: Records Provided
item.author: The Data Liberation Project
item.description: On June 10, 2024, BOP provided a set of responsive records, which the Data Liberation Project began reviewing.

item.title: Request Acknowledged, Placed on "Complex Track"
item.author: The Data Liberation Project
item.description: On October 28, 2022, BOP emailed an acknowledgment letter ðŸ“„ regarding this request, which has been assigned to the “complex” processing track. The agency has not made a determination on the request for a fee waiver.
